token.label: Max Completion Token
token.description: The number of tokens that will be used to generate the chat completion.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Increasing the value will make the output less deterministic.

presencePenalty.label: Presence Penalty
presencePenalty.description: Penalizes tokens based on whether they've already appeared in the text.

topP.label: Top-p
topP.description: Considers the results of tokens within the Top-p probability mass.

frequencyPenalty.label: Frequency Penalty
frequencyPenalty.description: Penalizes tokens based on their existing frequency within the text.
